title: I'm So Happy It's Happy Hour
description: Who doesn't enjoy a well-made drink and the opportunity for a little creative misbehavior? Anne Taintor s deliciously wry artwork is the perfect complement for the dozens of fabulous drink recipes in this chic collection. From classic sips-with-a-twist to unexpected treats such as the Greta Garbo, Slinky Mink, and 3 A.M. on a School Night, these sinfully delectable cocktails add style to any high-spirited occasion. Surely it's five o clock somewhere . . . .
author: Anne Taintor
